alert.note: Alert for Archuleta; La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 13 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 200 PM MONDAY UNTIL 800 PM MONDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...La Plata and Archuleta Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Durango, Pagosa Springs, and the Southern Ute Reservation. WHEN...200 PM Monday June 13 to 800 PM Monday June 13 IMPACTS...Very strong and gusty winds are producing widespread areas of blowing dust in northwestern New Mexico which is being transported into the advisory area. Areas of dust should gradually decrease throughout the advisory area Monday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
